quote: Only you can decide what is good/bad for you, people will give their biased opinions based on their past activities and thinking
author: Vikas G.

quote: Good things leads to better health better eq etc however cigarettes can only cause harm and is a temporary fix for your stress however we should try to strive for permanent fixes and be happy
author: Vivek N.

quote: Poker teaches patience values of correct plays will always help you in long run. No need to taking stress for short term failures
author: Vivek N.

quote: जरा मुस्कुरा के देखो, दुनिया हँसती नजर आएगी!
author: Abhishek B.

quote: I think humans are also jaadu of koi mil Gaya, bas hum jaadu ko internally use karte h
author: Vatsal S.
